articles.title: The Fed Could Start Pulling Back on Support Next Year. What That Means for Stocks. - Barron's
articles.description: If the Federal Reserve buys fewer bonds, their prices would be pressured and their rates would likely rise—and higher interest rates pressure stock valuations.
